hero.title: Securing the Digital Frontier
hero.subtitle: Delivering secure, innovative web systems to support Ministry of Defense operations.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To provide the Ministry of Defense with cutting-edge, resilient, and user-centric digital solutions that enhance operational efficiency and data security.

future.title: Future Initiatives 2030
future.ai_desc: Integrating autonomous threat detection algorithms into national grid systems.
future.quantum_desc: Developing post-quantum encryption standards for classified communications.
future.cloud_desc: Deploying decentralized cloud nodes for real-time tactical data processing.
